flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

lines.text: Welcome to my online magazine! My name is Cieanna and I am going to show you the lastest and best fashion trends to wear and what type of clothes best fits your body! Also, I will talk about easy and simple ways to turn a simple outfit into something rockin!
lines.text_raw: Welcome to my online magazine! My name is Cieanna and I am going to show you the lastest and best fashion trends to wear and what type of clothes best fits your body! Also, I will talk about easy and simple ways to turn a simple outfit into something rockin!

guide.summary: I will make a magazine about the latest fashion trends and how you can find them in your own closet! My goal is to take something simple and make it into a sweet outfit!
guide.title: Making Design
